thread.title: Solange, Killer Mike, Kim Gordon, Big Boi, More Set for HBO’s “Animals” Season 2
thread.title_full: Solange, Killer Mike, Kim Gordon, Big Boi, More Set for HBO’s “Animals” Season 2

author: Pitchfork
title: Solange, Killer Mike, Kim Gordon, Big Boi, More Set for HBO’s “Animals” Season 2
text:
3 hrs ago Solange, Killer Mike, Kim Gordon, Big Boi, More Set for HBO’s “Animals” Season 2 Other guests on the animated program include Big Sean, Usher, RuPaul, Whoopi Goldberg, Fred Armisen, and Jason Alexander Solange (Mike Coppola/Getty Images for Busboys and Poets), Killer Mike (Tim Mosenfelder/Getty Images) Kim Gordon (Emma McIntyre/Getty Images) 
HBO has announced the second season of its animated program “ Animals .” The show returns March 17, and will feature a number of high profile guests, including: Solange , Kim Gordon , Killer Mike , Big Boi , Big Sean , Usher , Ice-T , and Fred Armisen . Tony Hale (“Arrested Development”), Jason Alexander (“Seinfeld”), RuPaul Charles, Whoopi Goldberg, and more are also slated for voice cameos. Watch the new “Animals” Season 2 teaser below. 
“Animals” was created by Phil Matarese and Mike Luciano, and is executive produced by Mark and Jay Duplass. The first season included guest spots from Kurt Vile ( as a squirrel ), A$AP Rocky and A$AP Ferg ( as bodega cats ), Eric André, Aziz Ansari, and many others. 
Watch Solange perform “Losing You” at Pitchfork Music Festival 2013: Artists In This Story
